text: ¥ string E ("23+5%8-"); cout << "enter a post-fix expression (enter 'quit’ when done) ... "; cin > E; while(E.compare("quit") != 0){ for (int i-0; i<E.length(); i+=1){ cout << E[i] << " "; char x = E[i]; IF((x >= '0")&&(x <="9")){ cout << " digit \n"; ¥ else( cout << " operator \n"; ¥ ¥ cout << "enter a post-fix expression (enter 'quit’ when done) ... "; cin > E; ¥ cout << "good-bye." << endl; return 0; }
